title: Being Honest About Our Eating Journeys
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: Eating Disorders
This week on Unfazed and Unbothered Tasia and Camo respond the food policing they've received in the comment section of their TikToks recently. The two open up about their relationships with food, diet culture, and their experiences surrounding disordered eating patterns. Through their personal anecdotes you can learn the empowerment that comes from listening to your own body and ignoring how other's judge your choices. Tasia and Camo also answer juicy fan questions, you won't want to miss this jam packed episode!!
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube
If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be helpful! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: https://bit.ly/UnfazedandUnbotheredPodcast
Follow Tasia on TikTok
Follow Camo on TikTok
Follow Tasia on IG
Follow Camo on IG
Follow Camo on YouTube
Listen to Camo's music on Spotify
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
